1115234140461211648.text:
This week in crypto:

-@ConsenSys announces startups chosen for Tachyon accelerator program 
-@sigp_io Eth2.0 testnet client live 
-@Rocket_Pool April development update 
-@ConnextNetwork's @Arjun_Bhuptani on the Into the Ether podcast 

More https://ethhub.substack.com/p/ethhub-weekly-56 …

1112482242117451778.text: Hey hey, episode 17 is right of the virtual presses, straight to you with Luke Anderson, co-founder of @sigp_io. We covered how Luke chose Computer Science, discovered Ethereum, open source software, public speaking and more. Tune in  #podcast https://buff.ly/2OB8DjF pic.twitter.com/N4bR6t0xE2

1118234063087783937.text: Licensing: why it matters in Open Source. A great thread by @ethZed who leads @sigp_io, the team behind the @rustlang implementation of ETH2, Lighthouse.https://twitter.com/ethZed/status/1117989925624745986 …

1117989925624745986.text: We're very excited to announce that our #Ethereum 2.0 implementation #Lighthouse has been re-licensed from GPLv2 to Apache 2.0! Many thanks to all our contributors who agreed to this change! Curious about what this means? Short thread

1112623979313795072.text:
LIghthouse #Ethereum 2.0 beacon node!
Top: #Lighthouse beacon node: #libp2p ready, simplified spec (8 validators - demonstrative)
Middle: Validator Client - Gets duties signs/publishes blocks/attestations
Bottom: Second node - Syncs and gossips via #libp2p to first node.pic.twitter.com/gdok9fym1h

1112116284055937025.text:
Completing another round of testing and bug squashing today... #Ethereum 2.0, rust beacon node, running on #libp2p demonstration vids inbound!
#lighthousehttps://twitter.com/ethZed/status/1111499764418240512 …

1112605017196756992.text: 8 #lighthouse nodes syncing with block and attestation production from our validator client. Networked with rust-libp2p gossipsub, via an AWS server!  #eth2 @sigp_io @AgeManning @sproulM_ @spble @ethZedpic.twitter.com/KRZq0hqbtN

1101422823816548353.text: Catch my talk at #EthCC in Paris on Wednesday morning to hear all about lighthouse, the #Ethereum #Serenity Rust implementation we've been working on @sigp_io

1093711795217289216.text: Extremely proud of @AgeManning for being the main contributor to the smart contract security chapter of “Mastering Ethereum“ by @aantonop & @gavofyork ! if you haven’t already, check out his reference post on our @sigp_io blog - https://blog.sigmaprime.io/solidity-security.html …pic.twitter.com/GvbPEbI11V

1092863143854755841.text:
Two weeks ago I started working with @kyokan_io to prepare a report on the ETH 2.0 effort. We interviewed ETH 2.0 leads from @prylabs @PegaSysEng @ChainSafeth @ethstatus and @sigp_io, as well as @dannyryan. 

Here are our findings:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PS0k9MaKPdPwEw3Uh9rq7USjq7LcSpT6ICQUXRij4YE/edit?usp=drivesdk …

1126300489002262528.text: We'll definitely have room for @naddison kids at @sigp_io when it comes time for work experience https://twitter.com/naddison/status/1126262996232105985 …

1123806204696891393.text:
The latest #lighthouse update is out!

Achievements:
- Re-licensed to Apache 2.0
- Passing state-transition tests.
- 25x faster merkle-roots.
- Assisting with BLS standardization.

Upcoming:
- Spec v0.6.x
- Discv5
- Progress towards multi-client testnet.https://lighthouse.sigmaprime.io/update-10.html

1123406615573458944.text: We're proud to be collaborating with @drakefjustin, @ChiaNetworkInc, @Algorand to produce a cross-chain BLS signature standard. We've been implementing experimental hashing algos in @rustlang, providing feedback to researchers.https://github.com/pairingwg/bls_standard/blob/master/minutes/spec-v1.md …

1112853101969498112.text:
Checkout the latest #Lighthouse development update! 

https://lighthouse.sigmaprime.io/update-09.html 

Our rusty beacon node and multi-threaded validator client can now produce a functional, short-lived, single-client testnet!

#Ethereum #Serenity

1106223638695469058.text:
We've published benchmarks from #Lighthouse for 16k, 300k and 4M validators.

They're testing the functional Ethereum 2.0 state transition components, with parallelization.

Read the results or run them yourself:https://github.com/sigp/serenity-benches …

1100265443028131840.text: Latest #Lighthouse update is out! - Overview of fork-choice rules, BLS algorithms and dev updates. Check it out at:https://lighthouse.sigmaprime.io/update-08.html

1093750944590778368.text:
The latest #Lighthouse update is live! 

Alongside dev updates, we seek to help set public expectations around the Q1 Beacon Chain testnet.https://lighthouse.sigmaprime.io/update-07.html

1092664059869024257.text: Thanks for the support @Gitcoin, you do great work.https://twitter.com/gitcoin/status/1092547648446492672 …

1090133542728654848.text:
.@AgeManning just published a PR which implements gossipsub in rust-libp2p.

Gossipsub is the p2p protocol for Eth2.0.https://github.com/libp2p/rust-libp2p/pull/898 …

1089802642182660096.text: Lighthouse development has come a huge way over the past couple of weeks. We're looking forward to sharing progress in the coming days.https://twitter.com/paulhauner/status/1089799378645147648 …
